channel.description: i got some medieval homework i still need to do .... i need help with medieval art, music, food, medicine and fashion also if u found it from a site plz tell mi the site and same for if from a book. plz type the name of the book the page and author

[center][/center]

[b]Z^6: He admits it man.
RcX: I know man.

Z^6: So what the fuck do we do man?
RcX: Dude, we fucking…We fuck him up man, we’re gonna fuck him in his fucking face dude.

Z^6: All right, man! Dude, chill. Don’t harsh my mellow.
RcX: Aiiiight. I’ll get the pitchfork and shit. Pass me that bone, dude.[/b]

item.title: Medieval homework
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

And then they have wacky adventures, make a lot of mistakes yet somehow learn the moral lesson that…etc…

Where’s my fucking popcorn?

Asian people are so tragic. If they were all just on TV it would make things alot easier. We could have the drama of twelve year old Chinese girls in sweatshops who make our Nikes brought to us on Nik-at-Nite and there would be HBO documentaries about the sex lives of those living under the harsh “One Child Act”. Is Chung-Li going to get asked to the dance by her pedophile uncle or her abusive factory foreman boss? Are Wei-Yan and Dan-Ping going to abandon their baby under the bridge or just toss it down a sewer grate? It would make great TV, man.

Read full topic

item.title: Medieval homework
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

That kid man…he was crazy.
Says he was busting out the ill 180 spins, on his scooter, dude.
Apparently he’s a young pimp on the thing. A Razor, he tells me.

Kind of like an Asian James Dean, I think, except this kid is nothing like James Dean. He was a little something I like to call fucking fat. James Dean, in his many motion pictures, captured the “Rebel Without a Cause” phase that many teenagers go through, with fast cars and sex and drugs. The most amazing thing that Asian kid has captured is likely some used toilet paper, on the back of his shoe.

Read full topic

item.title: Medieval homework
item.dc:creator: @Try_Me Try Me
item.description:
@Try_Me wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:7, topic:105263”][quote]Actually Half the staff from Runescape helped me with my medieval homework…
[/quote]

Some little asian kid at the library was telling me all about these different kind of gems and shit, and he says to me “Guess where I learned all this? Runescape…” And he keeps talking but I’ll spare you, noble reader, from his gibberish. What I’m getting at is that if you know you are learning something from a videogame chances are it is not something very useful. The only important things you learn from games, like how to use gas propelled pieces of metal to destroy the vital organs of helpless people or what tone of voice to yell at hookers in, you are much too busy to notice.[/quote]
“I R L2GEM FRM DIS GAME ND I CAN B KEWL JSUT LIK MY ASIAN BROFER WHO LERN CHINESSSE FRM A BUK!”

Read full topic
